Product Description

This wildly popular game was Created by a 7 year old named Alex

Alex loves games and decided to create his own. For TACO VS. BURRITO, he spent months dreaming up ingredients, planning, and rethinking gameplay, and testing it thoroughly with people of all ages

When you buy TACO VS. BURRITO you are not only getting an amazing game that you’ll love but you are also helping a young entrepreneur get his business off the ground. Thank you!

Not A Stand Alone Game – It requires a copy of Taco vs Burrito Core Deck that is Sold Separately
New Game Play – Takes the game play in Taco vs Burrito to the next level with 20 new game-changing cards including James Beardo, Super No Bueno, and a Wild Card.
Surprisingly Strategic – Basic gameplay is easy to master but the Action Cards shift the game into unpredictable territory. Exciting up to the very last card!
Created By A Kid, Perfect For Everyone – Alex dreamed up TvB at age 7, but this crazy, fun strategic food fight is a smash with kids, teens, and adults alike! Ideal for ages from 7+. This popular fun card game is the perfect Christmas or birthday gift for your boys, girls, friends, or family.
Easy To Learn and Quick To Play – Takes 3 minutes to learn,15 minutes to play and is for 2-8 players. Includes 20 cards, 4 tortilla holders, and instructions in a portable box that makes it great for traveling and playing outdoors

item.dc:creator: admin

#50 in Dedicated Deck Card Games
Customer Reviews

4.7 out of 5 stars

39 ratings

4.7 out of 5 stars

Release date May 5, 2021
Language English
Manufacturer What Do You Meme?

Price: $14.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:18:12 UTC – Details)


Oh. My. God. Put on your Thanksgiving pants and bring out the bagpipes — the What Do You Meme? Friends Expansion Pack is here! Now you can combine your favorite meme card game with the beloved sitcom. Featuring all the iconic moments from the show (and your fave cast members, like Ross, Rachel, Monica, Chandler, Joey and Phoebe, of course!), this expansion pack makes for an epic game night, watch party addition, or hangout game. Give it as a gift to your Friends-obsessed coworker, bestie, girlfriend, sibling, or parent— or just treat yourself. It’s even better than Phoebe’s grandma’s cookies.
He’s Her Lobster: The Friends Expansion Pack is the epic new addition to your favorite meme card game that’ll have you saying “OH. MY. GOD!” all game night long!
Pivot! Pivot!: Just queue your favorite episodes and shuffle this pack into the main deck for a Friends-themed game night.
What’s Inside: 50 caption cards, 30 photo cards
How to Play: It’s easier than making a trifle. Just shuffle these cards into the main deck — then take turns matching a caption card to the photo card in play each round! A rotating judge picks the funniest combo.
More Fun: Brought to you by What Do You Meme?. Check out our full collection of fun stuff and games for adults, kids, and families!

Read more

4.5
Price: $14.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:18:12 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $35.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:55 UTC – Details)

From the brand

WOOD CITY Shut the Box Game

Shut the Box Game for Party, Family

About us

WOOD CITY aims to provide high-quality wooden early learning intelligence toys for all young children, by researching early childhood development, growth, practice.

We strive to achieve a collective vision of providing the best and up-to-date educational wooden toys for all young children, and commit to ensuring that they thrive and learn in a community where they reach their full potential and develop their intellect and imagination.

Shut the Box for 6 Players

Shut the Box for 4 Players

Fast Sling Puck Game

Upgraded Version for 6 Players: This shut the box game set designed for up to 6 players includes hexagonal game board lined with felt and completed with 1-10 numbers, instructions, 16 dice (12 colored, 4 original wood color). Kids and adults can enjoy the deal of strategy and luck and hours of fun while playing.
Learning While Playing: Simple math are required to play the shut-the-box dice game. Kids could improve basic mathematical addition skills, exercise logical thinking, problem solving abilities and enhance interpersonal communication and build good relationships with their friends. With gift box package design, this shut the box game set is a perfect gift for kids.
Blast Quick Game: No more time for a complicated game? Choose our wooden shut the box game. You can play a game for as long or as short a time as is available with 6 People. You can also customized rules to play more round.
Portable Traditional Game for Different Occasions: This 6-way close the box dice game is a portable and easy to carry wooden board game. It can be play in many different occasions, perfect for family, classroom, parties, pub etc. to have a great time with your family members, friends, classmates.
Premium Craftsmanship: The wooden shut the box game is made of solid natural wood which is durable and sturdy. Felt surface pad could reduce the noise when dice hit the board so that you can focus on the game. If you have any issues with our shut the box game, do not hesitate to get in touch with us and we will be more than happy to ensure you have a satisfying buying experience.

SHUT THE BOX GAME WOODEN for 6 PLAYERS

  • Shut the Box is a particular dice game, our upgraded version can be played up to 6 players.
  • The history of the game could be over 250 years and originated in Normandy.
  • In pubs, Shut the Box is traditionally played as a gambling game, but we don’t advocate it generally.
  • Nowadays, it becomes a more and more popular board game during family activities, parties, and festivals.
  • Either for social and family entertainment or as an excellent tool for kids to learn math calculations.
  • The player rolls the dice, adds up the numbers, and then puts down the pieces that have the sum.
  • Enjoy the luck of the game as well as exercising the ability of divergent thinking to find more combinations.

PERFECT TABLETOP GAME

  • Whether it’s a game at a party to liven things up, or a bar gambling to punish the loser for drinking.
  • It can be both considered as our first choice of tool.
  • Portable, and can play with several friends at the same time to increase the play ability.
  • Not only are there various play rules, but also can through personal luck to create thrilling moments.




Shut the Box Wooden Game for 4 Players
Car Ramp Toy for Toddler
Toddler Fine Motor Skills Toys, Bee to Hive Matching Game
Battery Operated Train for Wooden Train Set
Wooden Train Set, Battery Operated Trains & Wooden Train Tracks
Gift Collection Popular Board Game Ramp Racer Toys for 2 Year Old and up Wooden Color Sorting Toy for Toddler 2 3 Years Old Electric Trains for Wooden Train Set Toy Train Gift for Train Lovers

item.title: The Office BFFs: Tales of The Office from Two Best Friends Who Were There
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) INSTANT #1 NEW YORK TIMES BESTSELLER An intimate, behind-the-scenes, richly illustrated celebration of beloved The Office co-stars Jenna Fischer and Angela Kinsey’s friendship, and an insiders’ view of Pam Beesly, Angela Martin, and the iconic TV show. Featuring many of their never-before-seen photos. Receptionist Pam Beesly and accountant Angela Martin ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:35:23 UTC – Details)

INSTANT #1 NEW YORK TIMES BESTSELLER

An intimate, behind-the-scenes, richly illustrated celebration of beloved The Office co-stars Jenna Fischer and Angela Kinsey’s friendship, and an insiders’ view of Pam Beesly, Angela Martin, and the iconic TV show. Featuring many of their never-before-seen photos.

Receptionist Pam Beesly and accountant Angela Martin had very little in common when they toiled together at Scranton’s Dunder Mifflin Paper Company. But, in reality, the two bonded in their very first days on set and, over the nine seasons of the series’ run, built a friendship that transcended the show and continues to this day. Sharing everything from what it was like in the early days as the show struggled to gain traction, to walking their first red carpet—plus exclusive stories on the making of milestone episodes and how their lives changed when they became moms—The Office BFFs is full of the same warm and friendly tone Jenna and Angela have brought to their Office Ladies podcast.


From the Publisher

Language ‏ : ‎ English
Hardcover ‏ : ‎ 336 pages
ISBN-10 ‏ : ‎ 0063007592
ISBN-13 ‏ : ‎ 978-0063007598

item.title: Best Friends by Sheri The Original Calming Donut Cat and Dog Bed in Shag and Lux Fur, Machine Washable, High Bolster, Multiple Sizes S-XXL
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Give your pet more than just a dog bed! Best Friend’s by Sheri is the original creator of the most popular dog bed that has surfaced the internet in recent years: The Calming Donut Dog Bed. This innovative cuddler shag design provides better sleep, supports joints, and offers a calming, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $34.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 03:48:54 UTC – Details)


Give your pet more than just a dog bed! Best Friend’s by Sheri is the original creator of the most popular dog bed that has surfaced the internet in recent years: The Calming Donut Dog Bed. This innovative cuddler shag design provides better sleep, supports joints, and offers a calming, self-warming effect. The donut cuddler is carefully crafted with durable, vegan nylon and filled with CoziLOFT fibers, allowing your pet to be instantly enveloped in premium, soft, luxurious comfort. The poly filling in our calming dog bed keeps its loft for up to 3Xs longer than standard pet beds, meaning it provides longer comfort, support and aesthetic appeal. Encouraging a deeper night’s rest or a refreshing daytime nap, our soothing dog bed is special because it’s been carefully designed to provide optimal neck, joint, and muscle support. For dogs and cats who like to burrow, the bed creates a perfect space for cuddles and top-notch snuggling. With a water and dirt-resistant bottom, our calming pet bed helps prevent messes from reaching your floors. When accidents happen, toss the shell or bed (small 23″x23″) into the washing machine for easy clean up. Follow the instructions on the label to ensure proper care.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 17.91 x 13.39 x 10.43 inches; 2.18 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 4598
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 2, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Sentiments, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01MV0IX66
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China
Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

SUPERIOR COMFORT: Cozy, flexible, and finished with vegan faux shag fur, our warming luxury dog bed is reminiscent of a mother’s fur coat. Paired with deep crevices that allow your pet to burrow, animals will have full, restful sleep for improved behavior and better health. The uniquely designed CoziLOFT fibers keep their loft for up to 3Xs longer than standard pet beds.
VERSATILE DESIGN and MAINTENANCE: Available in beautifully natural colors, our cat and dog donut beds are a seamless addition to any room’s décor. Finished with water and dirt-resistant bottoms, accidental messes will be prevented from reaching your floors. Removable shells available on size M-2XL beds are machine washable. The entirety of the small-sized bed is machine washable. (Do not leave bed to air dry, as this may lead to tangling and matting of the faux fur).
PET-SAFE MATERIALS: Tested through Consumer Product Safety Commission certified labs to ensure safety for you and your pets. Free from: flame retardants, formaldehyde, skin irritating chemicals, harsh dyes.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Designed and shipped from Los Angeles, CA, our local customer service is only a phone call or email away to address any concerns and questions to ensure you and your pets are happy with your purchase.

Read more

Best Friends by Sheri Calming Dog Beds & Cat Beds

Quality fill

Our calming dog beds are filled with premium quality fibers that provide added support and keep their loft for up to 3x longer than most other fiber-filled pet beds.

Pet-safe materials

Our calming dog beds are made with responsibly-sourced materials and fillings free from mercury, lead, heavy metals, formaldehyde, and cancer-causing flame retardents.

Soft to the touch

We use high quality, pet-safe, vegan faux fur that is not only long lasting and home-friendly, but ultra plush to provide comfort for your fur baby.

Easy to clean

Small size dog and cat beds are safe to machine wash and dry whole. Sizes medium – extra large come with machine washable zipper covers. Remove cover to wash.

Read more




Donut Shag
Cozy Cuddler Ilan
Deep Dish Lux
Pet Throw Shag
Bundle Donut Shag
Material Polyester Polyester Polyester Shag Polyester
Style – en – US Donut Cuddler Deep Dish Blanket Bundle
Machine Washable

  • Designed and shipped from the U.S.
  • Water and dirt-resistant base
  • Maintains thickness up to 3x longer
  • Double overlock-stitch provides a stronger, reinforced edge finish that gives durability through wear and wash.

Dog Bed & Cat Bed Care Instructions

Washing your pet bed

Entire bed is safe to machine wash and dry (small size). Removeable zipper shell is safe to machine wash and dry (medium, large, x-large sizes). Simply wash with cold water on the gentle cycle using non-toxic laundry detergent. Wash separately from other laundry items.

Drying your ped bed

Tumble dry low. To prevent shag fabric beds from matting, dry the bed thoroughly. Do not air dry.

About Best Friends by Sheri

Best Friends by Sheri is home of the Original Calming Donut Cuddler pet bed. Our calming dog beds, cat beds, faux fur donut beds, and pet huts are designed to mimic the anxiety-easing security of a mother’s fur coat. Part of the Outward Hound pack of brands, we’re a team of passionate pet parents who understand your pets are part of the family. We’re committed to developing products that inspire tails to wag, put smiles on faces, and make every adventure with your pet better. We spend our days listening to other pet parents and playing with our own pets so we can make the best toys, treats, and gear for yours. We’ve got your cat or dog covered with our award-winning brands, including Outward Hound, Best Friends by Sheri, Planet Dog, Petstages, Charming Pet, Wholesome Pride Pet Treats, and Nina Ottosson treat puzzle toys.
